attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Freshly made brioche donuts and baked goods with a view!
Restaurant, Wine Bar, Tapas, Spanish Food

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Changing careers in to follow her dream of working with chocolate, in 1999 Joanne set for herself a path of learning and mastering the craft of the Chocolatier. Under the tutelage of one of Vancouver's leading Chocolatiers, Joanne developed her technique and became adept in the art and science of creating fine chocolate. But knowing her craft was not enough to open a successful shop; a business strategy was required.

Joanne was selected to participate in the British Columbia Institute of Technology's (BCIT) Venture Program. This was an intensive incubator program during which Joanne researched the chocolate industry, and developed a business model and financial structure for her chocolaterie. She was elected Valedictorian for her session, and was also the Guest Speaker at the graduation of the following Venture Program session.
Joanne opened her shop Cocoa West Chocolatier on Bowen Island in British Columbia, just off of Vancouver in the summer of 2002.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Fair trade, organic handcrafted truffles and hot chocolate. Our retail shop also meets our wedding and corporate event customers' needs - vegan options are available. We have a boutique-style "bed and chocolate" accommodation at our Chocolate Suite on Bowen Island, B.C., just minutes from the Vancouver area. You can find us by email: cocoawest.com, Twitter:@CocoWestBC  or Facebook: facebook.com/CocoaWestChocolatier

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Julie and Christophe moved from the restaurant scene in Vancouver  to Bowen Island in 2004 to take over Tuscany Restaurant, which they operated until December 2012. In 2005 they created Artisan Eats cafe and very soon afterward secured Pastry Chef Michael who has been baking fresh organic breads and french viennoiserie ever since.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Started by the previous owners of Tuscany Restaurant, this cafe was created to provide a welcoming casual cafe with good, real food for Bowen Islanders and tourists alike. The airy room with an incredible view of mountains, ocean and forest is complimented by quality ingredients and tasty results!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: French pastries, home cut fries, house-made burgers, house smoked pulled pork, creative panini sandwiches,  locally roasted coffee
The Lions Bay General Store & Café is a Sea to Sky icon offering great coffee & a seasonal menu with draft beer, wine & cider. The General Store now sells beer, wine & spirits.

name: Cypress Mountain Crazy Raven Bar and Grill

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Sales and Marketing Director at Cypress Mountain, Crazy Raven Bar and Grill
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Cypress Mountain in West Vancouver, B.C., Canada. Cypress is only 30 minutes from downtown Vancouver and is proud to continue to provide our skiers, riders and sliders with the most vertical drop, most terrain, most lifts and best snow conditions on the highest skiing and riding peak of Vancouver's Legendary North Shore Mountains. With the best Winter Skiing & Riding in Vancouver, Canada's most popular Cross Country Skiing Area, a huge Snowtubing Park and our unique Snowshoeing Tours, Cypress truly offers something for everyone!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Kim has been the Assistant General Manager of Troll's Restaurant for the last 15 years. She is now the new General Manager and provides a friendly and warm smile to all those who enter the room.  Known for a cheery disposition and good sense of humor Kim will do her best to ensure your visit is one to remember!
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Joe and Dorothy ("Dot") Troll started Troll's Fish and Chips in 1946, opening only on weekends and holidays to cater to the local fisherman. Gary, Joe's son, and his wife Carol took over the restaurant in 1972 and despite the well-publicized lottery winnings of Gary Troll he continued to oversee the daily operations and prepare the early morning opening of the restaurant until 2017, when his son Ab Troll took over operations of the restaurant.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Troll's Restaurant located in the heart of Horseshoe Bay, West Vancouver has been serving customers for over 66 years!  Specializing in fish and chips and catering to all walks of life, Troll's is the one stop you must make when traveling on the ferries, heading to Whistler or just looking for a day out!  Stop on by we look forward to serving you!!

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: A great local pub on the top of Lonsdale Avenue with North Vancouver's best selection of Draught Beer. Really good food.
A hidden gem in False Creek. Amazing view from upstairs patio and really great 'Gastro Pub' atmosphere. Excellent draught beer and wine menu.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Originally Established in 1977.

In 1982, The Troller Pub was given permission to serve their own beer on premise, making it the first pub in Canada to serve craft beer on tap. The small brewery made from old dairy equipment was able to produce 30 kegs of ale per week; barely enough to keep up with the demand from the busy pub.

The pub was renovated in the early 90's and operated in its location until 2013. On August 22, 2013 The Troller was relocated to its current location at 6342 Bay Street (formerly Arigato Sushi) and continues to be a popular meeting place for residents of Horseshoe Bay and surrounding areas.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Troller Ale House has a large selection of craft beer and premium draught as well as Fresh Tap Wines. The menu consists of quality pub fare with reasonable prices and generous portions. Specialties include fish & chips, house-made burgers,  fresh salads, seafood dishes as well as pub favourites like chicken wings, fish tacos, pulled pork poutine and a Giant Yorkshire Pudding.

Located steps from the ferry terminal, the room was recently renovated and can be described as a modern pub with incredible views of the marina, mountains and Howe Sound. The pub features nicely appointed furnishings, dark wood and recycled materials in a bright, vibrant room. The heated and covered patio has 36 seats and is great for watching ferries come and go.

The pub also offers a vast selection of beer and wine for take out with over the counter off sale service.

location.address3: On The Pier By The Ferry
display_address: On The Pier By The Ferry

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Doc's is located right next to the marina in Snug Cove on beautiful Bowen Island, only 20min by ferry from Vancouver. Live music on weekends! Huge sunny patio with incomparable views. Gorgeous heritage dining room. Best Fish and Chips in BC! Family friendly lower patio. Upper bar over 19 only. Live entertainment weekly. Free babysitting! Fresh seafood, fantastic pub favorites, and home made desserts and pies by our own Chef Lawrence. Book your event here, we have a huge outdoor patio for big barbeques! Ice cold off-sales available, ATM inside. WiFi. Perfect venue for conferences or private parties. Don't miss out on the best little day getaway from Vancouver.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Started at the Bowen Island Golf Club on weekends.  Recently relocated to Snug Cove and share the space with the Village Baker!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We make artisan soups in small batches...both meaty and vegan/gluten free.  We are known for our Cove Bowl(similar to the Glory Bowl), our Cove Bowl Dressing and Green Chickpea Hummus!  We make Pork and Shrimp Won Ton EVERYDAY!

Bowen Island newest eatery is now open!

Just steps from the Snug Cove ferry terminal and adjacent to the Union Steamship Marina boardwalk and trails of Crippen Regional Park, Tippy’s Cookhouse offers full service breakfast and brunch options as well as a great selection of take-out beverages, snacks and lunch items.

Open seven days a week Tippy’s offers the one of nicest outdoor patios on Bowen with the backdrop of Howe Sound and the North Shore Mountains. It is the perfect place to sit and relax while waiting for the ferry, or fueling up before your morning hike.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Founded in 2006, Mucho Burrito is a leading Canadian chain of premium fast-casual Mexican restaurants. We are committed indulging your cravings for contemporary Mexican cuisine with menu items infused with quality, flavour and flair. Our menu items are made in-house using only the freshest ingredients. The vibrant display of toppings you see is one of the visual examples of our commitment to quality. We invite you to experience better Mexican at Mucho Burrito.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Founded in 2006, Mucho Burrito is a leading Canadian chain of premium fast-casual Mexican restaurants. We are committed indulging your cravings for contemporary Mexican cuisine with menu items infused with quality, flavour and flair. Our menu items are made in-house using only the freshest ingredients. The vibrant display of toppings you see is one of the visual examples of our commitment to quality. We invite you to experience better Mexican at Mucho Burrito.
Casual counter-serve chain for build-your-own sandwiches & salads.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: With a lifetime of experience working in kitchens and restaurants in the Lower Mainland, Chanel brings a wealth of knowledge to The Whytecliff Kitchen. She has a real interest in eating as locally and organically as possible, hence our healthier menu!
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
The West Vancouver archives tell us that there has been a cafe or restaurant in Whytecliff Park since at least the 1950s. 

The Whytecliff Kitchen was established in 2014.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: The Whytecliff Kitchen is a seasonal cafe and coffee-house, nestled on the edge of a cliff and over looking the ocean in Whytecliff Park.

With Vintage concept, We bring fun to the park so you don't need to bother bringing food and drinks, we provide everything here from Coffee, Tea, Fries, Fish & Chips, Burgers, Hotdogs, Classic Poutine, Sparkling Lemonade and our Tasty Ice cream. Enjoy your lunch or dinner at our vintage patio or you can sit down anywhere at the cliff  or beach while watching seal or people diving.
